article_title: President's FCC Is Another Example Of Regulatory Overreach

article_metadata.author: EconoSTATS

og.description: By Donald Rieck and Wayne Winegarden President Obama’s State of the Union Speech is tonight. Along with his expected calls for higher taxes on the rich, President Obama’s agenda for 2015 will also include the expansion of his Administration’s regulatory overreach. As President Reagan might say, “There he goes again”. Lacking support [...]
